name: Abk-soft
overview: ABK-Soft: a Leader in Dating Software ABK-Soft is a leading international dating software and social networking software provider. ABK-Soft Limited is a privately owned company based in the United States, having Technology Partners in Russian Federation. With a variety of dating software options, multi-lingual capability of the products, easy customization and unmatched support ABK-Soft delivers a private-label solution for any businesses and individuals that are looking for customized personals website platform that takes on the look and feel of their existing website or of what they imagine it should look like.
